name: Cup o' Go | golangci-lint is now fully generics-compatible, and more talk about structured logging, telemetry, and more
summary: golangci-lint 1.52.0 releasedrevive 1.3.0 & 1.3.1 releasedfasthttp v1.45.0 releasedLast week's interview with fasthttp maintainer, Erik DubbelboerConf42: Golang 2023 last call for CFPsProposal accepted: log/slog: structured, leveled loggingProposal: add opt-in transparent telemetry to Go...
